scripts.prebuild: npm i && cd src && npm i
scripts.e2e: cd sampleApp && npm run clean && tns plugin remove nativescript-ngrx-remote-devtool && tns plugin add .. && npm run build
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd src; tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd src; tns run android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd src; tns plugin remove nativescript-ngrx-remote-devtool; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && npm run version-and-push
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && git push && npm publish
